name: Mob City C16
description:
Mob City for the Commodore 16.

Save New York in the 1930's from the Mob. Take out the gangsters in windows, door ways or popping up from the drains with your trusty pistol.

Features a PETSCII loading screen by Tommi "Electric" Musturi, a 1930's inspired title tune, 8 way scrolling and a high score table and name entry.
